description: '''Donna Allen''' (born May 15, 1958) is an American [[dance-pop]] singer, born in [[Key West, Florida]], and raised in [[Tampa, Florida|Tampa]]. At one point a [[cheerleader]] for the [[Tampa Bay Buccaneers]], she got her start performing in the bands Hi-Octane, Trama and Maxx.  During her tenure with MAXX she was courted by Alan Walden (Capricorn Records/Hustler Productions) before launching a solo career. She also sang backup on tour for [[Gloria Estefan]] for nine years.
